summary:
Story..Apparently to your benefit a high ranking elven official has accidently left a elven crystal laying around containing a few rare artifacts...Lucky you.. :P

 These Artifacts allow you to summon A few Rare Magic ElvenSabre\'s named ( Shadow,Shimmer,Ghost and Fury)
descriptionHtml:
[color=cyan]PLEASE ENDORSE IF YOU lIKE IT![/color]

[color=red]SpellTome Version last for 2 min requires Expert Conjurer.
Rings and Amulets Have no requirements. and last for 1hour and or Killed or when items are removed.[/color]



[color=cyan]ElvenSabre_Companions[/color]
[color=white]Release date: 02/20/2012[/color]
[color=white]Update date: 02/27/2013[/color]

[color=cyan]Update:[/color] ( Renamed Sabre\'s as Follows (ShadowSabre,MysticSabre,MoonSabre,FireSabre, and New BloodSabre.)Added Some New Effects To the Sabre\'s, also added SpellTomes for casters. Added A couple rings and a recipe to combined all single rings to a all in one ring.

Category:
Author: Jgreybear (Jgreybear@live.com)


REQUIREMENTS
============
Skyrim/Skyrim update

RECOMENDED
==========

Description
===========
Story..Apperantly to your benefit a high ranking elven official has accidently left a elven crystal laying around containing a few rare artifacts...Lucky you.. :P

These Artifacts and SpellTomes allow you to summon A few Rare Magic ElvenSabre\'s

[color=red]WARNING!can\'t give them orders.. but you can summon and unsummon by just equiping the items [/color]

Location
========Located At the Stables in MarKath in a Elven Crystal container.

Install
=======
* Extract data folder from the zip file to your Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim



Uninstall
=========

Delete all Files/folders that say ElvenSabre,Petelvensabre\'s.esp,bsa,bsl


Incompatibility
===============
None I know.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None I know.

Contact
=======
jgreybear@live.com

Credits
=======
Textures :[color=lime]Jgreybear[/color]
Models:[color=lime]Jgreybear[/color]Slightly modified
Thanks to [color=lime]SkyrimNexus[/color] team for the articles, tutorials and all the wonderful stuff gathered here.
Thanks to [color=lime]Bethesda[/color] for the best game and the opportunity given to us to create new stuff (the Construction Kit ).

Based on Summon Animal Pets v1.6 (by Volek)

Tools Used
==========
Construction Kit
NIFSkope
Photoshop
Blender




Licensing
===============
(MUST GIVE CREDIT) IF USING MODELS AND TEXTURES. This is All that is Asked.
author: Jgreybear
